snippet.title: Arca's Path VR – Launch Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Arca’s Path launches on PlayStation VR on 4th December with a 10% discount*!

Sign up at http://www.arcaspath.com/ to get the FREE Arca’s Path VR audio track!

Tricked by a wicked android witch, you must seek a path home and escape the simulated world of Arca. Experience intuitive hands-free gameplay. Arca’s Path VR is an atmospheric VR gaming experience.

*Discount available from 04/12/2018 – 11/12/2018
